description: Squirting is an almost mythical practice. It's rumored to be or dismissed as simply pissing, and there are certainly performers who cheat and do just that. But Flower Tucci is not one to fake it; she's the real deal, an industry legend, and can produce seemingly endless streams of odorless, colorless, sweet-tasting liquid from her nether regions. We parked her sweet ass in front of a camera and had her give us the explicit, step-by-step lowdown on exactly how she does it. Those viewers who are biologically female might now be inspired to try it at home, while everybody else can simply sit back and bask in the glory of this awesome human fountain.
title: Squirting 101 with Flower Tucci
